attributes.action: Change St George Cross on England home and away football kits back to original
attributes.additional_details: We all should respect our flag, our country, our origin. The flag of England's representative football team should most definitely not be changed in relation to anything. Our flag should not be multicoloured on our kit as we have been red for years and will be red for years to come. I don't know the reason for this colour change but it is definitely receiving backlash from our country. We should not allow politics, other countries, people's sexual orientation, etc have an impact on our flag.
attributes.background: Make Nike change the multicoloured flag on the collar of the new England football 2024 kits back to the original red colour.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
